channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk says DOGE has no power to cut costs: ‘We are merely advisors’
item.description: “We’re not the dictators of the government, we are the advisors,” Musk says after backing way off his initial goal to save $2 trillion

item.title: R.F.K. Jr. Has Unlikely Allies in His Drive to Limit Atrazine
item.description: An unlikely group is coalescing around the health secretary’s drive for restrictions on atrazine, which is linked to cancer, birth defects and low spe...

item.title: This happiness author used to claim happiness is a choice. Now she admits she was wrong
item.description: Self-care alone was never going to solve the happiness equation.

item.title: Don’t fall for the lie that coconut oil is a healthy superfood, expert warns
item.description: Here's what one expert has to say about the so-called superfood.

item.title: Accenture CEO: ‘If your dreams don’t scare you, they’re not big enough’ — and she has the motto on a plaque in her home
item.description: Accenture’s chair and CEO, Julie Sweet, has revealed the motto she tells herself when she feels like she’s bitten more than she can chew in her career...

item.title: Google pushes AI deeper into its empire of search, shopping, and work products at its developer conference
item.description: With new tools spanning Search, Shopping, Workspace, and more, Google shows how AI at scale—and inside everything—may be its biggest advantage.

item.title: Britain, France and Canada Condemn Israel’s Expansion of Gaza War
item.description: Britain, France and Canada called the Israeli plans for escalation “disproportionate” and “egregious” at a time when the U.N. is warning the populatio...

item.title: New Orleans Jail Employee Is Arrested and Charged With Helping 10 Inmates Escape
item.description: A maintenance worker shut off water at the jail, allowing the inmates to remove a toilet and sink fixture from a cell wall, according to the Louisiana...

item.title: Google Unveils ‘A.I. Mode’ Chatbot, Signaling a New Era for Search
item.description: The tech giant is taking its next big step in artificial intelligence by adding interactive capabilities to its flagship product.

item.title: G7 Officials Gather Amid Headwinds From Trump’s Trade War
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will meet his international counterparts at a G7 finance ministers meeting in Canada.

item.title: Ukrainians Brace for a Longer War as Trump Backs Off Cease-Fire Call
item.description: President Trump appears to be stepping back from trying to end the war in Ukraine. Many in the country see little choice but to battle on.
